org.apache.oodt.cas.workflow.structs

Interface WorkflowTaskInstance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BranchRedirector, ConditionTaskInstance, ExternScriptTaskInstance, FilterTask, GoodbyeWorld, HelloWorld, LongTask, MailTask, NoOpTask, NumIncrementTask, PGETaskInstance, RandomStatusUpdateTask, RollbackableWorkflowTaskInstance, StdPGETaskInstance, WinPGETaskInstance

    public interface WorkflowTaskInstance
    Version:
    $Revsion$

    The part of a WorkflowTask that is responsible for actually doing the work.

    Author:
    mattmann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void run(Metadata metadata, WorkflowTaskConfiguration config)
      Runs the Task with the specified metadata context.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run(Metadata metadata,
         WorkflowTaskConfiguration config)
  throws WorkflowTaskInstanceException

        Runs the Task with the specified metadata context.

        Parameters:
        metadata - The TaskContext of metadata that is shared between the tasks.
        config - The static configuration metadata for this task.
        Throws:
        WorkflowTaskInstanceException
